text:
[Verse]
City lights shining bright
Neon colors in the night
Dancing shadows left and right
Feel the rhythm feel the light

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat racing through the crowd
Music pumping feeling proud
Energized and feeling loud
Here and now we stand unbowed

[Chorus]
Neon nights neon lights
Feel the magic in the heights
Neon nights neon dreams
Glowing colors endless beams

[Verse 3]
Electric skies electric vibes
In this moment we arrive
Forget the day come alive
Underneath this neon sky

[Bridge]
We won't stop till the dawn
All our worries will be gone
Just the beat we'll build upon
Rising up like a new-born song

[Chorus]
Neon nights neon lights
Feel the magic in the heights
Neon nights neon dreams
Glowing colors endless beams
title: Neon Nights
